# mOMOP

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://www.tidyverse.org/lifecycle/#experimental)
[![CRAN status](https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/mOMOP)](https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=mOMOP)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of mOMOP is to crosswalk mCode with the OMOP Vocabularies and CDM. 

## Installation

You can install mOMOP with:

``` r
library(devtools)
install_github("meerapatelmd/mOMOP")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(mOMOP)
## basic example code
```
